taskerProfile.title: Tasker Profile
taskerProfile.subtitle: Build your professional profile to attract more clients

completion.title: Complete Your Tasker Profile
completion.description: Complete your profile to start receiving job requests and build trust with clients.

personal.description: Update your basic information and professional photo
personal.avatarDescription: Upload a professional photo to build trust with clients
personal.emailNote: Contact support to change your email address

bio.description: Tell clients about your experience and expertise
bio.bioPlaceholder: Describe your skills, experience, and what makes you great at what you do...
bio.bioHint: Share your background, specialties, and why clients should choose you
bio.serviceRadiusHint: How far are you willing to travel for jobs?

skills.description: Manage the services you offer to clients
skills.noServicesDescription: Add services to start receiving job requests from clients

availability.description: Set your weekly availability for new jobs
availability.quickBookingDescription: Clients can instantly book you during your available hours for faster jobs

errors.enableAtLeastOneDay: Please enable at least one day of availability
errors.setStartEndTimes: Please set start and end times for all enabled days
errors.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time
errors.profileNotFound: Profile not found. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.invalidTimeFormat: Invalid time format. Please use HH:MM format (e.g., 09:00)

verification.description: Verify your identity to build trust and unlock all features
verification.identityDescription: Upload a government-issued ID to verify your identity and start offering services
verification.acceptedDocuments: Accepted: Driver's License, Passport, National ID Card
verification.benefit1: Unlock all tasker features and job applications
verification.benefit2: Build trust with clients through verified status

addresses.description: Add the areas where you provide services
addresses.emptyDescription: Add service areas to let clients know where you work
addresses.label: Label

serviceLocations.description: Manage where you provide your services.

security.description: Manage your account security and sign-in preferences
security.passwordDescription: Use a strong password to protect your account
security.deactivateDescription: This will permanently disable your tasker account

payment.description: Manage your payment methods for receiving earnings
payment.noMethodsDescription: Add a payment method to receive earnings from completed jobs

notifications.description: Choose how you'd like to be notified about jobs
notifications.emailDescription: Receive job alerts and updates via email
notifications.pushDescription: Get instant notifications on your device
notifications.smsDescription: Receive urgent job alerts via text message
notifications.marketingDescription: Receive promotional offers and platform updates
notifications.jobAlertsDescription: Get notified when new jobs match your skills
notifications.emptyDescription: You have no notifications at this time.

errors.loginRequired: Please log in to view your tasker profile
errors.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
